root: ^Did we really need to go to the next village's market to get the tools needed? My feet are getting sore!
^We have been walking for 3 hours, Claire can you go on for a bit longer?
^I am not like you and Yuki! I cannot walk that fast for that long.
^We can take a small break if you need to, I think this is a safe place.
^Thank God! I was feeling like sh*t! I need to take five too! While we are stopped, who want sandwiches! I made them me self!
^With pleasure! I thank you Willow! Bon appétit!
^The girls relax while eating  until a crack is heard nearby.
^Be careful I heard movement! Everyone be ready!
^I don't know, but it's a large group!
^Can't we relax for more than 5 minutes in this world!
^Our group grab their weapons, preparing for the worst and it came.
^Looki looki here! What do we have? It's the little girlies.
^Was it not enough to burn our home? You need to pursue us too!?
^Sorry little ones, we are just listening to orders! It's nothing personal.
^Trust me you brutes! You made it personal!
^You destroyed our home...  because of orders? Who asked you to do that?
^Well, let's make a deal you beat us and we'll tell you. But if we beat you, you'll give us the deed of your home, no bloodshed just a good old bargains.
^What make you think you can bargain! You bloody wankers deserve to feel our pain!
^We will see who comes out on top, then we will think about your punishment!
^Perfectly fine by me! Let's go boys!
